data.pageText:
START

Select the START button to begin the tutorial.

BACK

Select the BACK button to navigate to the previous screen.

NEXT

Select the NEXT button to navigate to the next screen.

HELP

Select the HELP button to view the Help feature at any time while navigating through the tutorial.

EXIT

Select the EXIT button to quit the tutorial.

Screen Number

This indicates the current screen number and the total number of screens in this tutorial.

Audio Panel

This panel indicates that the screen has an audio element with the professorâ€™s notes.

PLAY/PAUSE

Select the PLAY/PAUSE button to start the audio or pause it.

TRANSCRIPT

Select the TRANSCRIPT button to view the audio transcript.

Submit

For screens that have an activity/question, select the Submit button to submit your answers. The instruction text will explain the action required on these screens.

Other Buttons

Some screens have interactive elements. Select these buttons for additional information. The instruction text will explain the action required on these screens.
